summary: Explore the old abandoned Ruined Prison in the southern Reach, taken over by a group of bandits.
descriptionHtml:
Explore the old abandoned Ruined Prison in the southern Reach, taken over by a group of bandits as their new base of operations.

--------------------

This adds a new dungeon, Ruined Prison, just east of Valthume in the southern Reach. It's on the harder end of the scale and features bandits as the main enemy. Works for anyone above lvl10 and levels appropriately, with plenty of loot.

Also should work with the random quests (like bounties) you can get around Skyrim.

Includes only two files: RuinedPrison.esp and a readme, drop the esp file to SkyrimData for installation.

--------------------

My other mods:
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43153/?]Rotating Quicksave[/url] - multiple per character quicksaves
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50074/?]Just Sleep[/url] - Immersive sleep and exhaustion
author: BuGi
